title: MISP2Sentinel
descriptionMarkdown: The MISP2Sentinel connector allows you to automatically push threat indicators from MISP to Sentinel via the Upload Indicators REST API.

sampleQueries.query: ThreatIntelligenceIndicator | where SourceSystem == 'MISP'| sort by TimeGenerated desc

dataTypes.name: ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: ThreatIntelligenceIndicator| where isnotempty(TimeGenerated) and SourceSystem == 'MISP' | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)

value: ThreatIntelligenceIndicator| where SourceSystem == 'MISP' | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated) | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

instructionSteps.title: Installation and setup instructions
instructionSteps.description:
Use the documentation from this GitHub repository to install and configure the MISP to Sentinel connector: 

https://github.com/cudeso/misp2sentinel
